text: Dreye () is a railway station located in Dreye, Germany. The station is located on the Wanne-Eickel–Hamburg railway and the train services are operated by NordWestBahn. The station has been part of the Bremen S-Bahn since December 2010. ==Train services== The station is served by the following services: *Bremen S-Bahn services Bremerhaven-Lehe - Osterholz-Scharmbeck - Bremen - Twistringen ==External links== ==References== Category:Railway stations in Lower Saxony
title: Dreye railway station
